revised_title: Non-Ferrous Metal Extraction: Technological Advances and Environmental Impacts
tldr: The author discusses the advancements in non-ferrous metal extraction, focusing on the changes in process engineering and the environmental challenges faced by the industry. They highlight the need for new processes to meet environmental restrictions and the potential economic benefits of these new methods. The article also explores the challenges of treating low-grade ores and the development of leaching processes for metal recovery.
